name: Avoid functions having creator to prefix table names in SQL statements and in SQL records (EGL)
description: This rule searches for all the functions having creator to prefix tables in SQL statements and in SQL records.
output: This report lists the following information: Function Full Name
rationale: Creator prefix will prevent the default creator to be used in the different environments : DEV, TEST, PREPROD, PROD.
remediation: Try to reduce the use of creator to prefix tables names in SQL statements and SQL records in functions.
alternativeName: Avoid functions having creator to prefix table names in SQL statements and in SQL records (EGL)
